verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David. A Maskil.) How blessed<WH835> is he whose transgression<WH6588> is forgiven,<WH5375> Whose sin<WH2401> is covered!<WH3680>
How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> to whom the Lord<WH3068> does not impute<WH2803> iniquity,<WH5771> And in whose spirit<WH7307> there<WH369> is no<WH369> deceit!<WH7423>
When<WH3588> I kept<WH2790> silent<WH2790> [about my sin], my body<WH6106> wasted<WH1086> away<WH1086> Through my groaning<WH7581> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.
For day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> Thy hand<WH3027> was heavy<WH3513> upon me; My vitality<WH3955> was drained<WH2015> away [as] with the fever<WH2725> heat<WH2725> of summer.<WH7019> Selah.<WH5542>

I acknowledged<WH3045> my sin<WH9128> to Thee, And my iniquity<WH5771> I did not hide;<WH3680> I said,<WH559> "I will confess<WH3034> my transgressions<WH6588> to the Lord<WH3068>"; And Thou didst forgive<WH5375> the guilt<WH5771> of my sin.<WH9128> Selah.<WH5542>

Therefore,<WH5921> <WH2088> let everyone<WH3605> who is godly<WH2623> pray<WH6419> to Thee in a time<WH6256> when Thou mayest be found;<WH4672> Surely<WH7534> in a flood<WH7858> of great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> they shall not reach<WH5060> him.
Thou art my hiding<WH5643> place;<WH5643> Thou dost preserve<WH5341> me from trouble;<WH9496> Thou dost surround<WH5437> me with songs<WH7438> of deliverance.<WH6405> Selah.<WH5542>
I will instruct<WH7919> you and teach<WH3384> you in the way<WH1870> which<WH2098> you should go;<WH1980> I will counsel<WH3289> you with My eye<WH5869> upon you.

Do not be as the horse<WH5483> or as the mule<WH6505> which have<WH369> no<WH369> understanding,<WH995> Whose trappings<WH5716> include bit<WH4964> and bridle<WH7448> to hold<WH1102> them in check,<WH1102> [Otherwise] they will not come<WH7126> near<WH7126> to you.
Many<WH7227> are the sorrows<WH4341> of the wicked;<WH7563> But he who trusts<WH982> in the Lord,<WH3068> lovingkindness<WH2617> shall surround<WH5437> him.
Be glad<WH8055> in the Lord<WH3068> and rejoice,<WH1523> you righteous<WH6662> ones,<WH6662> And shout<WH7442> for joy,<WH7442> all<WH3605> you who are upright<WH3477> in heart.<WH3820>
